title: Bachelor of Business Administration in Information Security and Assurance
description: The Kennesaw State University Information Security and Assurance (BBA-ISA) degree will provide you the skills to become technologically proficient, business-savvy, and capable of applying policy, education, and training others.  You will gain the experience of developing technology solutions to protect information assets from all types of threats and manage the risk associated with modern information usage.
school: Department of Information Systems and Security
